title: Build a ML model for predicting taxi fares | ML.NET [6 of 8]
excerpt: There are tons of different ways to use the model builder with ML.NET. In this video, we learn how to predict taxi fares based on distance traveled, trip time etc. using a regression algorithm.   Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet
